page.title: 17MEOLE BRACE SCHOOL
page.content: There are two comprehensive schools to the south of{Shrewsbury, Meole Brace School (l2OO pupils) and the{Priory School (7OO pupils). At{Meole Brace School they haver different subjects like Maths, Spelling, Reading, Music, Science, Woodwork, Sports, Metalwork and Computer Studies. The Headmaster is{Mr Pearce.}At the school they do Sports like Football, Rugby, Fishing, Golf, Volleyball, Hockey, Snooker, Basketball, Abseiling and Rock Climbing. The languages studied are French, German and Spanish. The School has a{Special Unit}for deaf children. There are eleven deaf pupils who come from all over Shropshire. There is an outstanding library with a lot of books. The school is very attractive and we shall be very glad to go there. Other schools that feed{Meole Brace School are{Coleham}and{Holy Cross.
